child.alt-names: Klàá, Dàà (autonyms in the main area in Côte d’Ivoire and in Guinea), Jùlaningbe (in Manding people in Guinea for the Kla group between Beyla and Sinko), Dan (the name used for the group to the SE of Touba).

child.pub-comments: Vydrin left this node unnamed. This node has been named Bandi to correspond to the parallel structure described in the composite tree.
child.publications: Vydrin, Valentin. 2009. On the Problem of the Proto-Mande Homeland, Вопросы языкового родства (Journal of Language Relationship), vol. 1, 107-142.
